quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Uncle Ben

quote: Your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm Spider-Man, not Spider-Boy. Now, where's my coffee?
author: Spider-Man

quote: I believe there's a hero in all of us, that keeps us honest, gives us strength, makes us noble, and finally allows us to die with pride, even though sometimes we have to be steady, and give up the thing we want the most. Even our dreams.
author: Aunt May

quote: You know, I guess one person can make a difference... nuff said.
author: Spider-Man

quote: Everybody needs help sometimes, Peter. Even Spider-Man.
author: Mary Jane Watson

quote: I don't want to fight you, Flash. I wouldn't want to hurt your fist.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm not like you. You're a murderer.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I have a knack for getting into trouble.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm just your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man!
author: Spider-Man

quote: When you can do the things that I can, but you don't, and then the bad things happen? They happen because of you.
author: Spider-Man

quote: Parker luck.
author: Spider-Man

quote: Why do I get the feeling that whenever we meet, I'm going to be the one who ends up bleeding?
author: Spider-Man

quote: Not everyone is meant to make a difference, but for me, the choice to lead an ordinary life is no longer an option.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm not alone. Not while I'm Spider-Man.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I don't know if I'm a superhero or a menace. Probably a little bit of both.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'll never stop trying to make a difference. As long as there's hope.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm the one who has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm not a hero, just a man who knows how to swing a web.
author: Spider-Man

quote: The one thing that's clear to me, is that you can't fight fire with fire.
author: Spider-Man

quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Uncle Ben

quote: My spider-sense is tingling.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I have a responsibility to use my abilities to help people in need.
author: Spider-Man

quote: This is my gift, my curse. Who am I? I'm Spider-Man.
author: Spider-Man

quote: The only way to get through life is to laugh your way through it. You either have to laugh or cry. I prefer to laugh. Crying gives me a headache.
author: Spider-Man

quote: It's not about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm stronger than I thought. I can lift a car. If I had to, I could probably even lift a... bus!
author: Spider-Man

quote: I've got you, I've got you. I swear on my spider-sense, I won't let you fall.
author: Spider-Man

quote: The world needs heroes, and it's time for me to step up and be one.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I'm Peter Parker. I'm Spider-Man. And I'm not afraid of you.
author: Spider-Man

quote: You know, I guess one person can make a difference. Nuff said.
author: Stan Lee

quote: You're the Spiderling. Crime-fighting spider. You're Spider-Boy?
author: Tony Stark

quote: It's not enough to be friendly. You have to be a friend.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I have to stop him... because I created him.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I've always felt like I'm different from everybody else. Like I don't quite fit in. Maybe because I'm not supposed to.
author: Miles Morales

quote: It's easy to do good when bad things aren't happening to you. But when the bad things come, how are you gonna act then?
author: Spider-Man

quote: I am the Ultimate Spider-Man. I'm not some guy in a bat suit.
author: Miles Morales

quote: If you keep something as complicated as love stored up inside, it could make you sick.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I know that I have a responsibility to use my powers to help people. That's why I'm Spider-Man.
author: Spider-Man

quote: With great power, comes great responsibility.
author: Uncle Ben

quote: I'm not Superman, you know. I can't be everywhere at once.
author: Spider-Man

quote: The one thing they love more than a hero is to see a hero fail, fall, die trying. In spite of everything you've done for them, eventually they will hate you.
author: Green Goblin

quote: It's not about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
author: Spider-Man

quote: Some people are just born with tragedy in their blood.
author: Spider-Man

quote: This is my gift, my curse. Who am I? I'm Spider-Man.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I can't turn my back on those in need. That's when I'll know I'm a true hero.
author: Spider-Man

quote: Things will never be the same. I'm a superhero. And I'm a married man.
author: Spider-Man

quote: The bigger the responsibility, the bigger the target.
author: Spider-Man

quote: I don't know if I'm a superhero or not. But I don't really care.
author: Miles Morales

quote: No matter what I do, no matter how hard I try, the ones I love will always be the ones who pay.
author: Spider-Man
